title: Retro Game SFX
description: Introducing the Retro Game SFX pack for Unreal Engine!
longDescription:
Preview || Support Discord



Introducing the Retro Game SFX pack for Unreal Engine!


This pack is perfect for game developers who want to add an 8-Bit vibe to their games. With over 500 high-quality sound effects inspired by classic video games and movies from the 80s and 90s, you'll be able to create a truly immersive retro experience for your players. From laser blasts to explosions, and power-ups to enemy death sounds, this pack has everything you need to bring your game to life.










What is this pack?💻

This pack features 512 high quality retro game sound effects!

  • 512 High quality retro game sound effects
  • Death Sounds
  • Explosions
  • Alarms
  • Buttons
  • Coins
  • Impacts
  • Menu Sounds
  • Bleeps
  • Interactions
  • Movement sounds
  • Ladder climbing
  • Stairs climbing
  • Falling sounds
  • Footsteps
  • Jumping and landing
  • Doors
  • Portals and transitions
  • Vehicles
  • Weapons
  • And more!









Where can I find more?📣


  • -My YouTube-
  • -My Product Page-
  • -My Website-








Got any questions?💭

Feel free to send me an email, or just ask your question in the question section of this page!

Or join the Support Discord!


Thank you for considering my pack!
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 512 High quality retro game sound effects
  • Death Sounds
  • Explosions
  • Alarms
  • Buttons
  • Coins
  • Impacts
  • Menu Sounds
  • Bleeps
  • Interactions
  • Movement sounds
  • Ladder climbing
  • Stairs climbing
  • Falling sounds
  • Footsteps
  • Jumping and landing
  • Doors
  • Portals and transitions
  • Vehicles
  • Weapons
  • And more!

Number of Audio Waves: 512

Number of Audio Cues: 512

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz

Do Sound FX loop: Some sound effects loop.

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
